name: ServiceNow
natural_language_description: 这是 ServiceNow 节点。主要用于: Consume ServiceNow API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: Authentication method to use | 默认值: oAuth2
available_options: Basic Auth (值: basicAuth)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user
available_options: Attachment (值: attachment)
Business Service (值: businessService)
Configuration Item (值: configurationItems)
Department (值: department)
Dictionary (值: dictionary)
Incident (值: incident)
Table Record (值: tableRecord)
User (值: user)
User Group (值: userGroup)
User Role (值: userRole)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: Unique identifier of the user | (必填项)

inputDataFieldName.name: inputDataFieldName
inputDataFieldName.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload
inputDataFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sysparm_exclude_reference_link (值: None) - Whether to exclude Table API links for reference fields
sysparm_fields (值: None) - A list of fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
sysparm_query (值: None) - An encoded query string used to filter the results. More info.
sysparm_display_value (值: None) - Choose which values to return

attachmentId.name: attachmentId
attachmentId.description: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete
attachmentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachment ID | 作用: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

download.name: download
download.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Attachments | 默认值: False | (必填项)

outputField.name: outputField
outputField.description: Field name where downloaded data will be placed
outputField.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Field | 作用: Field name where downloaded data will be placed | 默认值: data

short_description.name: short_description
short_description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Short Description | 作用: Short description of the user | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: active (值: None) - Whether to activate the user
building (值: None) - The Building address
city (值: None) - City of the user
company (值: None) - The name of the company for the user
country (值: None) - Country of the user
department (值: None) - Department of the user
email (值: None) - The email address associated with the user
first_name (值: None) - The first name of the user
gender (值: None) - The gender of the user
home_phone (值: None) - Home phone of the user
last_name (值: None) - The last name of the user
location (值: None) - Location of the user
manager (值: None) - Manager of the user
middle_name (值: None) - The middle name of the user
mobile_phone (值: None) - Mobile phone number of the user
user_password (值: None) - The user's password
password_needs_reset (值: None) - Whether to require a password reset when the user logs in
phone (值: None) - The main phone number of the user
roles (值: None) - Roles of the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
source (值: None)
state (值: None) - State for the user
street (值: None) - Street information for the user separated by comma
user_name (值: None) - A username associated with the user (e.g. user_name.123)
zip (值: None) - Zip code for the user

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: active (值: None) - Whether to activate the user
building (值: None) - The Building address
city (值: None) - City of the user
company (值: None) - The name of the company for the user
country (值: None) - Country of the user
department (值: None) - Department of the user
email (值: None) - The email address associated with the user
first_name (值: None) - The first name of the user
gender (值: None) - The gender of the user
home_phone (值: None) - Home phone of the user
last_name (值: None) - The last name of the user
location (值: None) - Location of the user
manager (值: None) - Manager of the user
middle_name (值: None) - The middle name of the user
mobile_phone (值: None) - Mobile phone number of the user
user_password (值: None) - The user's password
password_needs_reset (值: None) - Whether to require a password reset when the user logs in
phone (值: None) - The main phone number of the user
roles (值: None) - Roles of the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
source (值: None)
state (值: None) - State for the user
street (值: None) - Street information for the user separated by comma
user_name (值: None) - A username associated with the user (e.g. user_name.123)
zip (值: None) - Zip code for the user

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 默认值: columns
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: mapInput) - Use when node input names match destination field names
Define Below for Each Column (值: columns) - Set the value for each destination column
Nothing (值: nothing) - Don't send any column data

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all inputs.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all inputs.

fieldsToSend.name: fieldsToSend
fieldsToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}
available_options: field (值: None)

getOption.name: getOption
getOption.natural_language_description: 参数名: Retrieve Identifier | 作用: Unique identifier of the user | 默认值: id | (必填项)
available_options: ID (值: id)
Username (值: user_name)

user_name.name: user_name
user_name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: Unique identifier of the user | (必填项)
